title: Symbolism and Meaning in the Alchemical Painting
first_phrase: In the previous part of the text, the author talks about the various symbols in a painting, including the thunderbolt, Cyclops, and Philosophical Child. Now, in the last 200 tokens, the author delves deeper into the meaning of these symbols. The King and the Child-Helmsman serve as a representation of Will and Reason respectively, while an old man dressed in a tunic leans against the gunwale. The text also mentions the inscribed numbers on the symbols but fails to give a clear interpretation. Overall, the author tries to decode the painting to provide a better understanding of the alchemical symbols used.
content: The Globe of the World, that rests on the Redeemerâ€™s knees, is the symbol of the universal spirit of all things, destined to evolve until finally attaining perfection. That is the meaning of the alchemical symbol , with the cross dominating the symbol of material nature, of the Earth as a living being. On board the ship, the command falls to the King who represents the Will, whose orders are final. Above his crown is the number 1266, and between his sceptre and right shoulder is the number 1137. We have given up on attempts to clarify the meaning of these two figures, which are inscribed again on the winged globe at the feet of the Virgin. They could have a historical referent as passwords, the first referring to the act of theoretically formulating volitions and the second to their practical execution. These interpretive hypotheses have little in the way of solid foundation. Having confirmed that 1 + 2 + 2 + 6 = 15 and 1 + 1 + 3 + 7 = 12, we have not made much progress: the enigma remains. In front of the King and the Child-Helmsman, an old man dressed in a sort of tunic leans against the gunwale.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the symbolism and meaning behind the characters and objects in this text may be shrouded in mystery, but their representation of the universal spirit and the balance between material and spiritual nature offer an enlightening perspective on the evolution of all things towards perfection.
